Alloy Language Support.description: Basic support for the Alloy modeling language.

ASP.NET 5 Scripts Task Runner.description: Adds support for project.json's scripts in the Task Runner Explorer

Broccoli Task Runner.description: Adds support for Broccoli brocfile.js files as well as Ember-CLI's ember-cli-build.js build scripts based on Broccoli.

Brunch Task Runner.description: Adds support for the Brunch build tool in Visual Studio 2015's Task Runner Explorer.

Bundler & Minifier.description: Adds support for bundling and minifying JavaScript, CSS and HTML files in any project.

Command Task Runner.description: Adds support for command line batch files in Visual Studio 2015's Task Runner Explorer. Supports .cmd, .bat and .ps1 files.

DartVS.description: Some support for coding Dart in Visual Studio.

EditorConfig.description: Loads editor options such as indentation sizes from standard, cross-platform .editorconfig files.

Extensibility Tools.description: An extension for making it easier to write Visual Studio extensions

Flatten Packages.description: Flattens the node_modules folder hierarchy by using the 'flatten-packages' npm package behind the scenes. Works with long paths. Requires Node.js installed on the machine

Go Language Support.description: Basic support for the Go programming language.

Java Language Support.description: Basic support for the Java programming language.

JavaScript Snippet Pack.description: A snippet pack to make you more productive working with JavaScript.

React Snippet Pack.description: Snippet pack for use with the React JavaScript framework.

Karma Test Adapter.description: A Visual Studio test explorer adapter for Karma.

NPM Scripts Task Runner.description: Adds support for package.json's NPM scripts in the Task Runner Explorer

Open Command Line.description: Opens a command line at the root of the project. Support for all consoles such as CMD, PowerShell, Bash etc. Provides syntax highlighting, Intellisense and execution of .cmd and .bat files.

Package Installer.description: Makes it easier, faster and more convenient than ever to install Bower, npm and JSPM packages to any project.

SQL Server Compact/SQLite Toolbox.description: This add-in adds several features to help your embedded database development efforts: Scripting of tables and data, import from SQL Server and CSV files and much, much more.

TypeWriter.description: Automatic TypeScript Template generation from C# files.

Web Compiler.description: The easiest and most powerful way to compile LESS, Scss and CoffeeScript files directly within Visual Studio or through MSBuild.

Web Essentials 2015.description: Adds many useful features to Visual Studio for web developers

WebPack Task Runner.description: Adds support for WebPack in Visual Studio 2015's Task Runner Explorer.

Yaml Editor.description: Provides a complete YAML editing experience in Visual Studio, including: - Syntax highlightning - Syntax error detection - Comment / uncomment selection - Format document

Add New File.description: The fastest and easiest way to add new files to any project - including files that start with a dot.

Dummy Text Generator.description: Easily insert dummy text into the editor in Visual Studio. Lorem Ipsum and other vocabularies are supported.

File Nesting.description: Automatically nest files based on file name and enables developers to nest and unnest any file manually

Image Optimizer.description: Lossless optimization of JPEG, PNG and Gifs - including animated Gifs

MultiEditing.description:
Simultaneously edit in more than one location in the editor

If you've ever ran into a case where you wanted to quickly change variable names or multiple loop conditions - you can use Multi-Edit to set virtual carets that all behave the same.

Open in Visual Studio Code.description: Adds a menu command that lets you open any solution, project, folder and file in Visual Studio Code.

Trailing Whitespace Visualizer.description: Makes it easier than ever to identify and remove trailing whitespace in any code file

Visual Studio Spell Checker.description: An editor extension that checks the spelling of comments, strings, and plain text as you type or interactively with a tool window. Extra options are available to control how elements and attributes in XML and MAML files are spell checked.
